name: Fill It (itch)
description:
This is a personal project made in one month.

It's a simple puzzle game that gets really hard in the end while keeping simple game mechanics : fill and rotate.

Platform : Android

Engine : Unity 5

Number of players : 1

The team :

Rémi Leblanc : Design & Programming

Selgi Leblanc : Additional Level Design

Aurélien Montéro : Music & Sound

Nicolas Tham : Art

Pierre Vandermaesen : Additional Game Design
